## BrowserJsPlumbInstance.setPosition() method

Sets the position of the given element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setPosition(el: Element, p: PointXY): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  el | Element | Element to change position for |
|  p | PointXY | New location for the element. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
